CmdLine: elasticsearch-plugin install analysis-icu --batch   && elasticsearch-plugin install ingest-attachment --batch   && elasticsearch-plugin install https://github.com/vhyza/elasticsearch-analysis-lemmagen/releases/download/v$ELASTICSEARCH_VERSION/elasticsearch-analysis-lemmagen-$ELASTICSEARCH_VERSION-plugin.zip --batch   && curl -L -O https://github.com/vhyza/lemmagen-lexicons/archive/v1.0.tar.gz   && tar zxf v1.0.tar.gz   && mkdir config/lemmagen && mv ./lemmagen-lexicons-1.0/free/lexicons/* config/lemmagen/   && rm v1.0.tar.gz && rm -R ./lemmagen-lexicons-1.0
Commands.Name: run
